SEARCH
Module com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager
Package com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao

Class PortfolioDAO

java.lang.Object
com.javarepowizards.portfoliomanager.dao.PortfolioDAO
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPortfolioDAO
@Repository public class PortfolioDAO extends Object implements IPortfolioDAO
Data Access Object for portfolio operations. Supports both DB-backed and in-memory modes for retrieving and updating user holdings and balances.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors

    PortfolioDAO(IDatabaseConnection dbConnection)
    Constructs a DB-backed PortfolioDAO.
    PortfolioDAO(List<PortfolioEntry> holdings, double availableBalance)
    Constructs an in-memory PortfolioDAO for testing or simulation.
